name: Edu-Cultural Appropriation
description:
Simply mouse-click-and-drag around the screen to explore the room, there are 4 items in total to gather information from, as well as a couple of fun little doodads. If you have trouble reading the small text maximising your play window might help :)

This was a rapid-prototype project created during a Master's course in Creative Media - intending to educate and encourage critical thought on the state of cultural appropriation in today's 'global culture'.
